title: A Singing Voice That Reaches the Heavens
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>….Phew<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hanamaru-chan! Your singing voice was wonderful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, it’s because your backing was so full of heart, Riko-chan, Maru just went along with it zura<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I-, is that…. so? I’m not used to playing for a hymn backing, so I tried to at least be careful and sincere<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru thought it was wonderful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Thank you, I’m glad. I was also drawn to your singing voice, Hanamaru-chan, it gave a sacred feeling. Hymns are so strange. When you hear them, your mind becomes quiet and calm<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Aren’t they~? That’s how Maru feels too when Maru sings them zura♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Do you want to sing one more song?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Can Maru!? Then, then, the next song will be! ….ah, but that one is nice too…. Maru can’t choose zura….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, you can sing as many as you want!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
